The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 December is 1,839,170 (3,267.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 18 December, there were 183,167 new confirmed cases (325.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 December, there were 111,064 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 65% (72,103 extra cases).
